DESCRIPTION: Card becomes jammed. Jammed cards have no effect when played and then Unjam. #yStatus, #yCurse and #yUnplayable cards cannot be Jammed.
This card has no effect when played and then Unjams.
When a creature reaches #b20 Blight it loses #b50 HP and then loses #b20 Blight.
Unplayable. Plays itself when drawn, Exhausts itself, and draws 1 card.
Downgrading a card removes #y1 upgrade from it. Unupgraded cards cannot be Downgraded.
